DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT 'Trade:'+TradeId+'/'+LegType+'/'+Currency+'/'+convert(varchar,Id) LegDataId, T1.SeqId, T1.Spread, T1.StartDate FROM ORE.dbo.PortfolioFloatingLegSpreads T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.PortfolioLegData T2 ON T1.LegDataId = T2.Id

field.name: *LegDataId
field.lookup: SELECT 'Trade:'+TradeId+'/'+LegType+'/'+Currency+'/'+convert(varchar,Id) LegDataId,Id FROM ORE.dbo.PortfolioLegData ORDER BY TradeId
